医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
OSER1蛋白被发现对长寿有很大影响哥本哈根大学的一项新研究得出结论，事实证明，特定基因对寿命有很大影响。这可能为新的治疗方法铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/OSER1- Protein-found-to-have-great-influence-on-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/OSER1- Protein-found-to-have-great-influence-on-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=334039b7-1895-408f-9355-8f1a8c469c1f Wed, 04 Sep 2024 13:11:00 -0400 OSER1 protein found to have great influence on longevity
PCORI 宣布资助 1 亿美元用于儿科比较有效性研究以患者为中心的结果研究所 (PCORI) 今天开始通过八个新的资助机会邀请提案，其中包括三项以患者为中心的比较临床有效性研究 (CER) 的 PCORI 资助公告 (PFA)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/PCORI-announces-24100-million-funding-for-pediatric-comparative-effectness-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/PCORI-announces-24100-million-funding-for-pediatric-comparative- effectiveness-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88c03b5c-cd97-41f2-b89c-5b7b34bd5688 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 13:06:25 -0400 PCORI announces $100 million funding for pediatric comparative effectiveness research
新型中间体形式的血清素受体被确定为精神疾病的治疗靶点马克斯德尔布吕克中心的 Misha Kudryshev 实验室发现了一种与抑郁症和精神分裂症等疾病有关的血清素受体分子中间体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Novel-intermediate-form-of-serotonin-receptor-identified-as-therapeutic-target-for-psychiatric-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Novel-intermediate-form-of-serotonin-receptor-identified-as-therapeutic-target-for-psychiatric-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=465ce9dd-aca1-4717-b2ec-44b244221fa8 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 12:59:00 -0400 Novel intermediate form of serotonin receptor identified as therapeutic target for psychiatric disorders
研究揭示肥胖与心房颤动之间的关键酶联系肥胖和心房颤动之间的细胞联系——；全球有超过 3300 万人患有心脏病；伊利诺伊大学芝加哥分校的研究人员报告称，这为新疗法提供了一个有希望的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Study-uncovers-key-enzyme-link- Between-obesity-and-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Study-uncovers-key-enzyme-link- Between-obesity-and-acial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48892641-eafe-4253-bedf-fa6b713c1d31 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 12:49:20 -0400 Study uncovers key enzyme link between obesity and atrial fibrillation
磁性纳米粒子增强冷冻保存组织的安全解冻每天都有人在等待器官移植的过程中死去。时间非常宝贵，不仅对于那些等待器官的人来说，而且对于器官本身来说也是如此，因为器官在运输过程中会迅速恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Magnetic-nanoarticles-enhance-safe-thawing-of-cryopreserved-tissues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Magnetic-nanoarticles-enhance-safe-thawing-of-cryopreserved-tissues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09661c66-e3f3-491f-b58a-6ba900e0bf56 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 12:40:04 -0400 Magnetic nanoparticles enhance safe thawing of cryopreserved tissues
艾伦研究所和 NYSCF 启动合作创建包容性细胞模型今天，艾伦细胞科学研究所和纽约干细胞基金会 (NYSCF) 宣布开展开创性合作，以解决这一关键问题，结合两种尖端技术，创建更具包容性的疾病研究细胞模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Allen-Institute-and-NYSCF-launch-collaboration-to-create-inclusive-cellular-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Allen-Institute-and-NYSCF-launch-collaboration-to-create-inclusive-cellular-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=713454dd-eb63-4a02-9323-663bd3d1ccb7 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 12:32:42 -0400 Allen Institute and NYSCF launch collaboration to create inclusive cellular models
新的免疫治疗方法有望最大限度地减少脊髓损伤华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员在小鼠身上设计了一种方法，通过使用工程免疫细胞来最大限度地减少脊髓损伤造成的损害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/New-immunotherapy-approach-shows-promise-for-minimizing-spinal-cord-injury-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/New-immunotherapy-approach-shows-promise-for-minimizing-spinal-cord-injury-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e8e9424-5037-4fff-b7f0-6bc45fbc973e Wed, 04 Sep 2024 12:22:31 -0400 New immunotherapy approach shows promise for minimizing spinal cord injury damage
经常使用手机会增加吸烟者和糖尿病患者患心血管疾病的风险一项新研究发现，经常使用手机与心血管疾病风险呈正相关，特别是对于当前吸烟者和糖尿病患者。此外，这种关联部分归因于睡眠不佳、心理困扰和神经质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Regular-mobile-phone-use-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-smokers-and-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Regular-mobile-phone-use-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-smokers-and-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43cf0bb8-76bc-40ce-a4a7-2d7666cc3d2e Wed, 04 Sep 2024 07:20:31 -0400 Regular mobile phone use linked to increased cardiovascular disease risk in smokers and diabetics
对于非职业运动员来说，运动脑震荡可能与长期认知风险无关新南威尔士大学医学研究人员领导的一项研究表明，运动相关脑震荡（SRC）可能与非职业运动员的长期认知风险无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Sports-concussions-may-not-be-lated-to-long-term-cognitive-risks-for-non-professional-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Sports-concussions-may-not-be-lated-to-long-term-cognitive-risks-for-non-professional-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53d20fd7-c0c0-4cb9-8e2a-1e40f0c924a2 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 07:17:12 -0400 Sports concussions may not be related to long-term cognitive risks for non-professional athletes
索马鲁肽不会增加抑郁或自杀念头的风险宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，服用减肥药物索马鲁肽不会增加没有已知重大精神健康障碍的人出现抑郁症状、自杀想法或自杀行为的风险。本周《美国医学会杂志内科》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Semaglutide-does-not-increase-risk-of-depression-or-suicidal-thoughts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Semaglutide-does-not-increase-risk-of-depression-or-suicidal-thoughts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8330d76-b117-433f-903a-7a054653c305 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 07:06:28 -0400 Semaglutide does not increase risk of depression or suicidal thoughts
